user_stories.action: to see highlights about the product
user_stories.result: I can be motivated to sign up

user_stories.action: to sign up with my email
user_stories.result: I can create an account

user_stories.action: to create my profile
user_stories.result: I can details about myself that will make it easier for brands to find me

user_stories.action: to connect my social network accounts
user_stories.result: my social stats can be displayed on my profile

user_stories.action: to see all my current requests from brands
user_stories.result: I can view new opportunities

user_stories.action: to chat with a brand
user_stories.result: I can ask question I might have before I approve the request or while I'm working on a request I approved

user_stories.action: to view a brands profile
user_stories.result: I can see a few details about them

acceptance_criterions.description: I'm assuming that this will include the ui implementation for the brand profile

user_stories.action: to approve or ignore a request from a brand
user_stories.result: I can either start on a request I want or ignore one I don't want to work on

user_stories.action: to see a current status on approved request
user_stories.result: I can stay current on all details

acceptance_criterions.description: Verify that progress such as, acceptance, in progress, and completed is shown.

user_stories.action: to mark a request as completed
user_stories.result: the brand can be notified that I've completed promoting the their product

user_stories.action: to view my profile
user_stories.result: I can see what brands are seeing

user_stories.action: to manage my profile
user_stories.result: I can keep it up to date

user_stories.action: to see my history of completed requests
user_stories.result: I can keep everything on record

user_stories.action: to manage my account details
user_stories.result: I can keep them up to date

user_stories.action: to set my notification preferences
user_stories.result: I can set all notifications from app to my preference

user_stories.action: to refer my friends to the app
user_stories.result: they can sign up and benefit from the app

user_stories.action: to be able to get help on the app
user_stories.result: my needs or questions can be answered

user_stories.action: log out from my account
user_stories.result: I'm no longer logged in

user_stories.action: to log in with my email
user_stories.result: I can access my account

user_stories.action: to reset my password
user_stories.result: if I forget my current password, I can regain access to my account
